statements: DELETE FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_type = 'Absent' AND behavior_date = '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE student_id = 1 AND behavior_type = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM behavior_data WHERE student_id = 101 AND observation_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM behavior_data WHERE observation_date = '2023-05-10' AND student_id = 123
DELETE FROM Interventions WHERE student_id = 101 AND intervention_type = 'Behavior Modification';

DELETE FROM student_interventions
WHERE student_id = 1 AND intervention_id = 3;
DELETE FROM ProgressReports WHERE student_id = 3 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM InterventionLog WHERE intervention_type = 'Behavioral' AND student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM StudentDetails WHERE grade_level = '10th');
